course_description: This course is the second in a series on Electromagnetism beginning with Electromagnetism I ([8.02](/courses/8-02-physics-ii-electricity-and-magnetism-spring-2019/) or {{% resource_link "b46d6c85-0e42-4091-8b6e-ea77f9e336be" "8.022" %}}). It is a survey of basic electromagnetic phenomena: electrostatics; magnetostatics; electromagnetic properties of matter; time-dependent electromagnetic fields; Maxwell's equations; electromagnetic waves; emission, absorption, and scattering of radiation; and relativistic electrodynamics and mechanics.
title: Course Metadata
